Title: TC948 - Meeting Management Solution
Description:
The contract is for the provision of a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution to be used as a meeting management system for the day to day management of public and high level internal meetings. 

Its introduction will address the existing technology gap to cover the following areas, providing support for the full end-to-end process:

•	Document collaboration
•	Version control
•	Tracking of clearances
•	Meeting attendance
•	Documents formatting
•	Documents distribution

Description: Charnwood Council is looking for a supplier to provide a fully integrated Committee Management & Democratic Services system which will assist the Democratic Services team to efficiently manage the democratic decision making process.
